alert.note: Alert for Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 27 at 11:47AM EDT until April 27 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SANTA ROSA COUNTY... At 1046 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Jay, or 15 miles south of Brewton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Santa Rosa County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
